content:
# EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Copper plate mine at position(x=41.0, y=-82.0)
Consists of following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position x=41.0, y=-82.0) and a stone furnace at position(x=41.0, y=-80.0)
- Burner inserter (position x=39.5, y=-79.5) and another burner inserter at position(x=41.5, y=-78.5)

### Copper plate mine at position(x=60.0, y=-60.0)
Consists of a stone furnace at position(x=60.0, y=-60.0)

### Electricity generator at position(x=106.5, y=-32.5)
Consists of an offshore pump (position x=106.5, y=-32.5), a boiler at position(x=111.5, y=-32.0), and a steam engine at position(x=117.5, y=-30.5)

### Transport belt system at position(x=63.5, y=-53.5)
Consists of transport belts at positions(x=63.5, y=-53.5) and (x=64.5, y=-53.5)

### Pipe group at position(x=107.5, y=-34.5)
Consists of pipe groups at positions(x=107.5, y=-34.5) and (x=105.5, y=-32.5)

### Electricity group at position(x=114.5, y=-28.666666666666668)
Consists of an electricity group at position(x=114.5, y=-28.666666666666668)

### Belt group at position(x=40.5, y=-83.5)
Consists of a belt group at position(x=40.5, y=-83.5)

# ERROR TIPS
### Errors when entities are not fueled
- Ensure that burner mining drills, stone furnaces, and boilers have fuel before they can operate.
- Make sure to provide fuel to entities that require it to function.

### Errors when entities are not connected
- Ensure that steam engines are connected to boilers and offshore pumps to function correctly.
- Make sure that entities that require connections are properly linked.

### Errors when entities are not plugged into the electric network
- Ensure that electricity groups are plugged into the electric network to function correctly.
- Make sure that entities that require electric power are properly connected to the network.

### Errors when belt groups are empty
- Ensure that belt groups have items to transport before they can function correctly.
- Make sure to provide items to belt groups that require them to operate.

# NAMESPACE
No utility functions have been defined by the agent.
No important variables have been assigned.
